channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: N.Y.C. Jail Official Broke Sanctuary Laws by Helping D.H.S., Report Says
item.description: A Department of Correction investigator improperly provided information to federal agents about two immigrants, a city watchdog agency found.

item.title: What’s Behind Nexstar and Sinclair Boycotting Jimmy Kimmel?

item.title: Starbucks is closing more stores and laying off 900 workers
item.description: The coffee giant plans to cut 900 corporate jobs and shut down about 1% of its stores as the chain's turnaround plan approaches a one-year mark.

item.title: Latest update of 1844 American songbook reflects new generation of 'Sacred Harp' singers
item.description: An 1844 religiously inspired songbook that uses shape notes to help people read music got a major update recently and it attracting younger singers.

item.title: Trump Wades Into Bailout Politics in Offering a Lifeline to Argentina
